profile.title: Profile
profile.profileViewsAnonymous: Profile views will be anonymous, and you won't see who viewed your profile.
profile.profileViewsVisible: You'll see who viewed your profile, and others will know when you view theirs.

network.showConnections: Show my network connections to others
network.connectionsVisible: Your connections can see your network and your degree of connection with other members.
network.connectionsHidden: Your connections will not be visible to others and you won't appear in others' connection lists.

verification.rejectedTooltip: This information could not be verified

events.createDescription: Fill in the form below to create a new event.
events.editDescription: Make changes to your event details below.
events.notFoundDescription: The event you're trying to edit doesn't exist or has been removed.
